ygData.subject: Re: Charisma effect on magic resists
ygData.msgSnippet: ... This could well be.  I don t claim to be absolutely correct on this, but I think dexterity also has more face validity than charisma does when it comes to
ygData.messageBody:
"Chris Kuenster (Entex)" wrote:

> From: "Chris Kuenster (Entex)" <v-ntxck@...>
>
> You must need incredible Dex then because my base is 124 and with a Shaman
> buff it is 161, I still miss alot of notes.

This could well be. I don't claim to be absolutely correct on this, but I
think dexterity also has more face validity than charisma does when it comes to
whether you miss a note.

Also note that the frequency of missed notes depends on how long you have had
the song in question. When I first tried playing chords of dissonance with a
horn, the missed notes were just unbelievable. I was like a junior high school
band. :)

Jyzan
